_header: Lady of love ye will me lese
Subjects: love lyrics; lovers, address to beloved
_description: An address to his lady — two quatrains (abab)

DULCosViii5.First Lines:
Lady of love ye wyll me leseIe lay alway on me yur
                    launce…
DULCosViii5.Last Lines:
…But aver hath loved lovede yow without varyingIf
                    ye safe evll may ye spede
DULCosViii5.Note:
Second occurrence, written below first. 6th line of this version crossed
                    out when writing and a different substitute written on next line.
